headline.main: Marlboro Man Doesn't Deserve Honor;Secondhand Smoke

docs.lead_paragraph: To the Editor: Re "Smoking's Pleasures Pale Next to Lung Disease" (letters, April 9):
docs.snippet: To the Editor:         Re "Smoking's Pleasures Pale Next to Lung Disease" (letters, April 9):

headline.main: Marlboro Man Doesn't Deserve Honor;Secondhand Smoke

docs.lead_paragraph: To the Editor: James Villas, in his April 6 Op-Ed article extolling the virtues of being surrounded by cigarette smoke, misrepresents a Congressional Research Service report on the effects of secondhand smoke.
docs.snippet: To the Editor:         James Villas, in his April 6 Op-Ed article extolling the virtues of being surrounded by cigarette smoke, misrepresents a Congressional Research Service report on the effects of secondhand smoke.

headline.main: Smoking's Pleasures Pale Next to Lung Disease

docs.lead_paragraph: To the Editor: Re "Cigarettes Make the Meal" (Op-Ed, April 6): What a difficult life James Villas endures now that he is denied his cigarettes in New York City restaurants.
docs.snippet: To the Editor:         Re "Cigarettes Make the Meal" (Op-Ed, April 6): What a difficult life James Villas endures now that he is denied his cigarettes in New York City restaurants.
